page.title: 12Pub Survey.S.Crinks,J.Steed.
page.content: The{Halfway House}is owned by Mr.Crinks.He has been landlord there for{15}years.It was built in{1845.}It used to be a{Coaching Inn},halfway between{Bodmin and Liskeard. We did a{Pub Survey}and asked 30 people some questions.These are the results. Everyone came diliberately to the pub.More than half the people did not live locally.Most people came by car and one bus load stopped. Most people came with friends. The favourite men's drink was{beer}and the ladies' favourite drink was{soft {drink. { 45%}of people went once a week. { 23%}went twice.{5%}went three times. { 27%}went more than three times a week to a pub. People like going to{pubs}for a drink and good company.
